synopsis.text:
He ading the charge against the nefarious priest Enrico Pucci, Jolyne Cujoh, Ermes Costello, and Emporio Alni√±o make their daring escape from Green Dolphin Street Jail and embark on a high-stakes chase across Florida. With Pucci's endgame drawing near, allies Weather Report and Narciso Anasui race to reunite with Jolyne and put an end to the villainous plot. As both factions traverse the Sunshine State, they must face off against Pucci's formidable Stand users, each with their own set of terrifying abilities.

Determined to fulfill the legacy of the Joestars' sworn enemy Dio Brando, Pucci aims to strip humanity of its free will, leaving them slaves to fate in his twisted vision of a utopia. With her father Jotaro incapacitated, Jolyne must rely on her prison-honed instincts and skills to thwart Pucci's divine ambitions. The climactic battle unfolds at the Kennedy Space Center, where the very fate of the world hangs in the balance.

This thrilling arc, spanning 17 volumes (Volumes 64-80) of the overall manga, was serialized in Weekly Shounen Jump from 1999 to 2003, and is known as "JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Stone Ocean (Part 3)". Join Jolyne and her allies as they fight to preserve humanity's freedom and face off against seemingly insurmountable odds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
